profile:
Abell Pest Control is a family owned Canadian company dedicated to providing effective, professional and courteous service in pest management. Started in 1924 with one office, Abell now employs several hundred people with branch offices across Canada and the United States.

Guaranteed Pest Control in Canada

Control of mice, roaches, ants, wasps, animals and dozens of other pests
-Full money-back guarantee
-FREE no-obligation quote
-Effective, safe and fast pest elimination

Guaranteed Pest Control
Pests bring dirt, disease, and discomfort through their bites and droppings. Effective, safe and fast elimination of the pest is what you need now.

Fast & Safe Elimination
Controlling pests can be done safely and effectively by a trained professional. Effective pest control is a three-step process:

1)-Identification: Our pest control technician will review your property to find the nature and extent of the pest infestation. The most important element is locating the source of the infestation.
2)-Elimination: Once the pests have been identified and located, your technician will safely eliminate the infestation -- guaranteed*.
3)-Prevention: After the pest infestation is eliminated, your technician will provide you with a complete review of your property, making specific recommendations to help keep the pests away permanently.


Guaranteed Extermination
Your contractual pest is Gone and Guaranteed. If you are not satisfied with the services provided to you within the guarantee period, you will receive a Full Money Back Refund!

* All Abell Service Recommendations must be complied with and follow up services allowed for during the guarantee period to be eligible for any refund. Call for details.

profile:
Rapid Pest Control Inc. is known for providing effective services for control of many unwanted guests like cockroaches, bedbugs, carpenter ants, hornets, outdoor insects and wildlife (raccoons, skunks, squirrels, groundhogs and opossums) by using a variety of exclusion and preventative measures with minimal use of chemicals.

We are qualified and well experienced pest control professionals with university education in entomology and over 10 years of industry experience. We are serving London Ontario and surrounding towns. We are Licensed exterminators and carry complete liability insurance. All products and chemicals are safely used according to government guidelines. Customer satisfaction is our pride. We work hands in hands with our clients and always involve them in the entire pest management process to deliver best suited pest control solutions considering their requirements. We believe in safe, humane and environment friendly pest management practices.

profile:
Kitchener-Waterloo’s leading commercial pest control company. We offer a variety of commercial and industrial services,  from restaurants to heavy industrial manufacturing and property management there is a solution to your pest issue. 

Pests: 

General pest management programs for commercial properties includes rodents, roaches and a variety of crawling insects.   Small and large fly programs for restaurants and office cafeterias are performed using source identification, UV fly lights, bioremedial foaming, residual spraying and fogging. For property management companies we specialize in bed bug treatments using steam and dry heat from commercial grade steamers and heat tents.  Nuisance bird control is performed via several methods including exclusion and deterrents. Whatever the needs of your commercial facility Sentinel Pest Control has a solution.

We solve and prevent pest problems for businesses. Whether you are a small restaurant, an office facility, a property manager or a large-scale food producer, we have the solutions to keep you pest-free and compliant.

We deal with all manner of pests: Insects, Rodents, Birds & Wildlife, Arachnids and even the dreaded Bed Bug. We believe that local businesses need a local partner in pest management.
name: Sentinel Pest Control
